title: PLS HELP ME, HOW DO I DO THIS???
body: How do I make a Rioter respond my post? Is it rare to them to respond, do we need the luck of the potato god so they respond us? Help me pls {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
{{summoner:31}}  + {{item:2010}} = {{summoner:30}} 

Potatos are good but poro snax are better!  I'm not rare, you just need to know where to look like here in Help & Support!  What can I help ya with?
I dont need anything, just testing the rioters :^)
PogChamp they actually exist, i hope you can always watch us Poro Snax God, thanks, bye :P {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
